short_summary: Memory is required for 6 delivery locations across Canada
full_summary:
==========================

# Tender Announcement for Memory Requirements

### General Information

* **Title:** Memory (HPE or equivalent) for Shared Services Canada
* **Reference Number:** SSC-22-00021083:T 
* **Publication Date:** December 12, 2022
* **Tender Closing Date:** January 4, 2023 2:00 PM EST

### Brief Description

Shared Services Canada (SSC) is seeking proposals from qualified vendors to provide memory solutions for six delivery locations across Canada.

### Key Details

* **GSIN Code:** The contract will be assigned the GSIN code N7021130, which corresponds to 'Computer, CPU, digital, special purpose, including vector, parallel, array, etc.'
* **Preferred Delivery Locations:** Canada
* **Government of Canada's Document Reference:** World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)

### Opportunities

Vendors are invited to submit their proposals, but please note that the tender is now closed, as the status of the tender is "Expried".

### How to Obtain Documents

For access to tender documents, please visit the following links:
- English: https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download/169779CD-BD42-4DD2-9FC1-BCCCE9C7B2BC
- French: https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/fr/fil/download/FE8A15DF-BCE6-4578-BB23-4BCDB821641B

### Contact Information

If you have any questions or concerns with regards to this tender, please do not hesitate to contact us:
* **Name:** David Bennett
* **Email:** [david.bennett5@ssc-spc.gc.ca](mailto:david.bennett5@ssc-spc.gc.ca)
* **Phone:** 6134629536
* **Fax:** 6139606026

Below are the key documents associated with this tender.
